FuncDef: The ntp multicast-client command configures a local device to work in NTP multicast client mode. The undo ntp multicast-client command removes a local device from the NTP multicast client mode. By default, the multicast client service is disabled.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view,Tunnel interface view,VLANIF interface view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a multicast IPv4 address, which is a Class D address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation. The default IP address is 224.0.1.1.

ExtraInfo: If a device is configured to receive NTP multicast packets on an interface, the local device is in multicast-client mode.
